meanings.definition: A person who commits the crime of deliberately setting fire to property.
meanings.sent1: The arsonists were caught red-handed setting fire to the abandoned building.
meanings.sent2: The police are searching for the arsonists responsible for the recent string of fires.
meanings.sent3: The arsonists accidentally set fire to their own hideout while trying to light a campfire.
meanings.sent4: The arsonists' actions ignited fear in the hearts of the local community.
meanings.sent5: The arsonists left a trail of destruction in their wake, burning everything in sight.
